analysis.description: YaYaCoin.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x1de31db379946823bbdf2c5e6c61a7cdcb6870f2.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x1de31db379946823bbdf2c5e6c61a7cdcb6870f2.sol:
	Contract YaYaCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x1de31db379946823bbdf2c5e6c61a7cdcb6870f2.sol#183-187)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

YaYaCoin.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x1de31db379946823bbdf2c5e6c61a7cdcb6870f2.sol)
